title: Good but sloooowww start.
review: I've watched this twice. I must have stopped watching the first time, because I didn't recall any scenes from the falling action. This time around, I contemplated cutting my losses and finding something else SEVERAL times in in the first 40 minutes. However, at about the 41-42 minute mark something shifted, and It was enough for me to believe that this could still be salvageable. It was.
